p: Pearl spar, a white spar, identified as grade 11 having coverage of 70.00 kg/m 2, were collected from Ibom Plaza garden in Uyo, Akwa Ibom State. Washing was carried out to remove unwanted materials, dried for one hour at 100 °C before grind to lower particle size for easy activation ( Fig. 2). All chemicals used were of standard grade and needed no further purification.
